Articles.Content:
Hi there, wonderful to find this game at last; it was getting boring sat under under a rock.

Having a whale of a time trying to load the mods I'd like without crashing the install and having to start from the beginning again, so I'll be browsing about trying to figure things out for a bit.

yeah.

some times the game will allow you to run 100 mods at once! then other times the game doesn't even feel like running 2.

but welcome to the forums!

Welcome NathanChimp! Yeah, if it helps any, try using the plugin called Active Texture Management to tone down on memory and RAM usage...should allow you to use a lot of high-end mods without cooking your game or computer!
Welcome! Mods always end up making the game more crashy, that's mostly why I play stock.
